rationale: SQL Profile requires a license for Oracle Tuning Pack to use.
recommended_action:
Disable Diagnostic & Tuning Packs:
alter system set control_management_pack_access = NONE scope=both
Drop all SQL Profiles: https://docs.oracle.com/database/121/TGSQL/tgsql_profiles.htm#TGSQL613
error_message: SQL Profile is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Tuning Pack
